beer.beer_description: Gee-wiz, this one's a Christmas cracker - brewed with the legends at RAR Brewing hailing from Maryland, US of A and dropping just in time for Carwyn's Canvent! We've unleashed a Pastry and Liquid Cream kettle sour treatment that's stacked with raspberry, cherry, mango, and blueberry, then spun out with lashings of coconut ice cream, and a big festive bump of Xmas cake pow wow. It's sweet, tart, and creamy, and utterly indulgent - every sip bouncing between red berry compote, tropical fruit whip, and holiday dessert decadence. Full-tilt collab energy with a sleigh-load of hype.

items.checkin_comment: Cc12 - oh how i wanted to hate this. But I did naht. Tart blueberry. Touch of lactose sweetness but not to the point its overwhelming. Thick as shit. Stunning beer

user.bio: Reincarnation of Saint Nicholas - Patron Saint of drinking and the first drunkard

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
